title: Halloween dog poop emoji biscuits
ingredients: ['310g plain flour', '125g icing sugar', '75g unsweetened cocoa powder', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '2 teaspoons vanilla sugar', '1 pinch salt', '130g unsalted butter, cubed', '60ml milk', '1 egg', 'For the decoration', '3 tablespoons icing sugar', '2 teaspoons lemon juice, as needed', '90 candy eyeballs']
